name: You had ONE job...!
description:
***HOW TO PLAY***

After an accident our lovely lady can no longer leave her bed. She orders everything she needs from her robot but she can't remember the names of the objects. Only with the right description she gets the desired item.

In the thought bubble you see what she wants. Use the available adjectives that describe the item or exclude the ones that don't match to fulfill her wish.  And most importantly - have fun! =D

This is the third time for our two-ladies team to work together on a game jam.  :)

For the Wowie Jam 4.0 all teams and solo devs were given 3.5 Days to create a game fitting the theme of "Collaborate With AI". If you also participated in the jam and like our submission  please visit the Jam Page and rate it over there, thank you <3

 P.S.:

We're currently working on a Roguelike  where you can build your own maps to explore and you can join our mailing list to support us and get updates on our progress =D
